Articles.Content: Is there a way to look at, and/or modify, action groups after launch?

Mods. [Action Groups Extended](https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0CB8QFjAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fforum.kerbalspaceprogram.com%2Fthreads%2F74195-0-90-%2528Mar26-15%2529-Action-Groups-Extended-250-Action-Groups-in-flight-editing-Now-kOS-RemoteTech&ei=RRU4VeSiJbPIsQTZ3YC4Bw&usg=AFQjCNE4AxGrF0NPK6QPpq3N6XOTx7QGlg&sig2=1gdBtSZjqPi7IT_FAKau9w&bvm=bv.91427555,d.cWc) and [Action Group Manager](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60593-WIP-ActionGroupManager-%28AGM%29-initial-release). Not Stock.
At the bottom or your quicksave/persistence folder will be a list of your selected action groups. You can modify it how you wish.
